It's pointless. You've got to get involved in the- I saw a woman, girl, once again, a teenage girl. A team of surgeons could fiddle around in your head for a couple of days and they still wouldn't know what you were thinking. I know what you're thinking. I know what you're thinking. Exactly. You're, you're thinking of, you're thinking, could a monkey ever be president at this moment? Aren't you?

But I don't, I don't like anyone that like, all those badges that you're talking about like, you know, save the whale and all that.
